entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Need a way to convert an ImageSource into an IImage. #10624
  • Scaling for Mac Catalyst #10622
  • Update internal workload/feed provisioning scripts #10621
    7.0
  • Entry Control: When IsPassword is enabled and FontSize isn't specified , the text font doesn't affect placeholder font #10620
  • Random Android.Util.AndroidRuntimeException Only the original thread that created a view hierarchy can touch its views. #10618
  • Color options missing #10611
  • Improve Android 12+ splash images #10604
    Backlog
  • [Mac Catalyst] Application.Current.OpenWindow not working #10603
    Backlog
  • Failed To Build/Publish "Maui Blazor App" In Android Release Mode #10602
  • Provide a way to show pin hint window programmatically #10601
    Backlog
  • Fail to install MAUI from main branch with error "Failed to install manifest microsoft.net.workload.mono.toolchain version 6.0.10... is not found in NuGet feeds" #10600
    Backlog

Closed

  • Permissions.CheckStatusAsync<LocationWhenInUse> calls OnAppearing when Denied and not invoking permission prompt #10566
    7.0
  • OnAppearing gets called numerous times before page appears on Windows version of app #9473
    7.0
  • Icon for Android or iOS #10569
  • Default testing device #10605
  • iOS NPE on navigating away from TabbedPage #10362
    Backlog
  • Inconsistencies with ColumnSpacing and missing columns in a Grid #10528
    Backlog
  • [Android] Splash Screen BaseSize broken #10275
    Backlog
  • Generated splash screen does not retain aspect ratio #5676
    .NET 7 Planning
  • InvalidCastException when using recommended ViewRenderer<TView, TNativeView> #10537
    7.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Secondary Tap Scenarios on Android #10619
  • [Housekeeping] Added more Frame samples to Core Gallery #10616
    platform/macOS 🍏, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • [MacCatalyst] Fix issue rendering background gradient in catalyst searchbar #10615
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [iOS] Handle focus changes for UIButton #10614
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1343.22 to 1.0.1370.28 #10606
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Don't fire appearing/disappearing with window #10530
    area/lifecycle 🔁
  • [iOS] Fix crash disposing TabbedPage #10594
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/TabbedPage
  • Fix catalyst secondary click to match windows #10525
    platform/macOS 🍏
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22451.2 to 7.0.0-preview1.22504.1 #10599
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Make Grid of spacing consistent when rows/columns are collapsed #10556
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, layout-grid
  • Generate a more complete splash screen drawable set for Android #10516
    area/single project ☝️, 7.0
  • Validate authenticity of compatibility renderer #10567
  • Bump Microsoft.Graphics.Win2D from 1.0.3.1 to 1.0.4 #10502
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • iOS15 WindowStateManager Window Support #10550
    area/lifecycle 🔁, platform/iOS 🍎, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Added Tag to map pin #10446
    community ✨
  • [Android] Implement PointerGestureRecognizer for Android #10352
    area/gestures
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web from 6.0.8 to 6.0.9 #10113
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, Blazor ❤️ MAUI
  • [Android] Improve CollectionView scrolling #10523
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃
  • Fix top-left aligned shapes issue #10417
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Bump xunit from 2.4.1 to 2.4.2 #9214
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
